brief_description: The scheme facilitates the annual appointment of contract-based sports trainers for conducting various local training camps across Uttarakhand, thereby promoting employment opportunities and strengthening grassroots sports infrastructure.
detailed_description: The scheme "Contract Khel Prashikshakon Ki Niyukti" implemented by the Department Of Sports, Uttarakhand, aims to appoint contract-based sports coaches to conduct local training camps for various sports across the state, benefiting approximately 250 coaches annually with employment. Coaches aged 21-70 years, with relevant qualifications, can apply, and permanent residency is not mandatory.
benefits: Employment Opportunity: Provides annual employment to approximately 250 sports coaches on a contract basis. Promotion of Sports: Facilitates the organization of local training camps for various sports, contributing to sports development. Skill Utilization: Offers a platform for qualified individuals with sports expertise to contribute to athlete development.
eligibility_criteria: The applicant must be a sportsperson or a coach. The applicant must be between 21 -70 years of age. The applicant must possess relevant educational qualifications. The applicant must possess relevant sports qualifications. Note: The applicant is not required to be a permanent/native resident of the state.

steps: Advertisement: An advertisement for the Yojana is likely issued annually around March, typically through daily newspapers. Application Submission: Interested candidates should apply based on the guidelines and deadlines mentioned in the advertisement. Selection: Applications are submitted to the District Sports Officers, who evaluate and forward eligible candidates. Appointment: Coaches are selected on a contractual basis to conduct training camps.

documents_required: Proof of Age (e.g., birth certificate, matriculation certificate). Educational Qualification Certificates. Sports Qualification Certificates (e.g., coaching certifications, participation certificates). Identity Proof (e.g., Aadhaar Card). Address Proof. Passport-size photographs. Any other documents as required.
